"特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア": "特定のクライアントオーダーのクリア"
"スーパーハード受注許可証の所持"

"Guren is patrolling around Stia Camp. The supplies from Aelio are making it easier for the Vanguard to operate, but they're still badly outnumbered. Guren says that as long as he has strength, he may as well take the lead in jobs such as this, if it'll allow his soldiers even a moment's rest."
